result.sms_english:
Wada kiya hai to zaroor nibhayenge,
Suraj ki kiran bankar chhat pe ayenge,
Hum hain to judayi ka gum kaisa,
Teri har subah ko phoolon se sajayenge.

Chalate rahe kadam.. kinara jarur milega,
Andhakaar se ladate rahe savera jarur khilega,
Jab than liya manjil par jaana raasta jarur milega,
E-Raahi na thak chal.. ek din samay jarur phirega.
good morning

Neend Bhari Aankhon Ko Zara Dheere Dheere Kholo,
Is Pyari Si Subah Ki Nami Se Apni Palko Ko Zara Dho Lo,
Humne To Aapko Bol Diya Hai Good Morning,
Ab Aapki Baari Hain Hume Good Morning To Bolo..

Suraj nikalne ka waqt ho gaya,
Phool khilne ka waqt ho gaya,
Meethi neend se jaago mere dost,
Sapne Haqeeqat me laane ka waqt ho gaya!
Good Morning

Gulaab khilte rahe zindgi ki raah mein,
hassi chamakti rahe aapki nigaah mein,
khushi ki lahar mile har kadam par aapko,
deta hai ye dil dua baar-baar aapko.
